ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by the U.S. National Science Foundation, grant ATM‐0602409. S.P.H. acknowledges funding from the Australian Research Council (DP1201100343), the European Research Council for “GC2.0: Unlocking the past for a clearer future”, and through NERC for the JPI‐Belmont project “PAleao‐Constraints on Monsoon Evolution and Dynamics (PACMEDY)”. We thank Li Guangqi for assistance with earlier analyses, Colin Prentice for comments on the draft manuscript, and Sonia Seneviratne for useful discussions of these results. We acknowledge the World Climate Research Program's Working Group on Coupled Modeling, which is responsible for CMIP, and the climate modeling groups in the Paleoclimate Modelling Intercomparison Project (PMIP) for producing and making their model output available. The U.S. Department of Energy's Program for Climate Model Diagnosis and Intercomparison provides coordinating support for CMIP and led development of software infrastructure in partnership with the Global Organization for Earth System Science Portals. The analyses and figures are based on data archived at ESFG on December 2015. The NCEP‐DOE Reanalysis 2 data were provided by the NOAA/OAR/ESRL PSD, Boulder, Colorado, USA, from their Web site at http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/. All of the data analyzed here are available online; a list of URLs is provided in the supporting information.
